Translations.Text: Glor DI est cxio heavens ter Li est Almighty Sagx

Li est Unu evicted those disbelieved among des popol de scripture their hejm mes exodus. Vi neniam opini ke ili las ili opini their preparations protekt them DI. Tiam DI ven them ili neniam expected jxet terror their kor. Tiel ili abandoned their hejm their own volition ankaux pressure believers. Vi lern this O vi posed vizi
Di ne force them las Li requited them en this life (eben mav than forcing them las)! En Hereafter Li commit them retribution Infer
This because ili opposed DI His messenger! those oppose DI His messenger DI est strict en enforcing retribution
Vi chop arb las gxi star its trunk est en accordance kun di testament Li surely humiliate des wicked
Whatever DI restored por His messenger ne est rezult your milit efforts vi batal cxeval aux sur pied. DI est 1 who SEND His messengers whomever LI VOL! DI est Omnipotent

(Whatever DI restored al His messenger el defeated communities ir DI His messenger form charity). Vi don gxi relativ orf poor vojagx alien Tiel gxi ne ceter monopolized per fort among vi! Vi keep spoils don al vi messenger ne sorb ki li enjoins vi el pren! Vi reverence DI. DI est strict en enforcing retribution
(Vi don) needy immigrated Ili evicted their hejm deprived de their properties ili streb di grace plezur kaj ili supported DI His messenger! Ili est des truthful

As por those proviz them hejm rifugx est believers them ili am those immigrated them ne trov hesitation their kor help them! En fakt, ili readily don them priority ecx when ili bezon ki ili don for Ja those overcome their natural stinginess est successful unu
Those igx believers them dir Our Lord forgive us our brethren who preceded us faith keep our kor el harboring any hatred towards those kred! Our Lord Vi est Compassionate Merciful

Hav vi not those pest hypocrisy kaj kiel ili dir al their companions disbelief among des popol scripture vi evicted ni ir vi neniam obe anyone opposes vi! anyone batal vi ni batal your flank. DI bor witness ili est liars
En fakt, se ili evicted ili ne ir them kaj anyone batal them ili ne supported them. Eben ili supported them ili would torn around fled Ili neniam win
Ja vi strik plur terror their kor than their tim DI. This est ili est popol who ne comprehend

Ili ne get together batal vi ili est well-shielded buildings behind mur! Their might aper formidable among themselves. Vi opini ili united when en fakt their kor divid. This est ili est popol who ne kompren
Their sort est sam as their counterparts preceded them. Ili sufer consequences their decisions. Ili incurred painful retribution
Ili est diabl li dir al human est Disbelieve tiam as baldaux as li disbelieves li dir mi disown vi! Mi tim DI Lord univers
destiny por ambaux them est Hellfire wherein ili abide forever This est requital transgressors
O vi kred vi reverence DI let cxiu anim ekzamen ki gxi send ahead por morgaux. Vi reverence DI; DI est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do
Ne est those forges DI Li far them forges! These est des wicked
Ne egal est dwellers de Hellfire dwellers de Paradise; dwellers Paradise est winners
Ni revealed this Quran mont vi seg gxi trem cxif reverence DI! Ni cite these ekzempl popol ke ili reflect
Li est 1 DI; tie ne est ali di Him. Knower de all sekret declarations. Li est plej Gracious Merciful
Li est 1 DI; tie ne est ali di Him. Regx plej Sankt Pac plej Fidel Supreme Almighty plej Powerful plej Dignified DI GLOR; far HAV partners
Li est 1 DI; Creator Initiator Designer. Al Him aparten plej bel nom! Glor Him est cxio heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
